channel.title: Wilderness, skiller, partyroom problem
channel.description: does anyone know how to make this happen like in wilderness when epople are fighting they use the ::skiller command and ::partyroom command in my server how do i make sure they cant use it in wildy please help :o

item.title: Wilderness, skiller, partyroom problem
item.dc:creator: @needhoster needhoster
item.description:
@needhoster wrote:

Threaten with a ban on your ::rules. Easiest solution, and more people are banned.

Read full topic

item.title: Wilderness, skiller, partyroom problem
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

[quote=“badger41, post:8, topic:338351”][quote author=nubbycoder link=topic=434738.msg3193172#msg3193172 date=1272484654]
if(inCombat) {
return;
} else {
return = false;
sendMessage (or sM) (“Sorry, you cannot use this command in the wild.”);
}

Not expert at java, but i think that would work.
[/quote]

just so you know.
the return = false is not needed.[/quote]

It’s not even a statement although ‘return false;’ is.

Read full topic

item.title: Wilderness, skiller, partyroom problem
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

[quote=“nubbycoder, post:6, topic:338351”]if(inCombat) {
return;
} else {
return = false;
sendMessage (or sM) (“Sorry, you cannot use this command in the wild.”);
}

Not expert at java, but i think that would work.[/quote]

With minor adjustments to make it a functioning Java snippet, that would be saying that if they are in combat, return, and if they aren’t in combat, return. All in all my post should serve you well.

Read full topic

item.title: Wilderness, skiller, partyroom problem
item.dc:creator: @demonlover14 demonlover14
item.description:
@demonlover14 wrote:

[quote=“Mr. Despair, post:4, topic:338351”][quote author=The Soul link=topic=434738.msg3192808#msg3192808 date=1272425309]
Use the inCombat variable, like so:

if(inCombat) { return; } else { /* do stuff */ }
[/quote]

This, but being disconnected would never hurt anyone.[/quote]
Yes it would. . .
If their trying to teleport away from combat or something and be dced, its hurting them…

Read full topic
